about_the_game:
Let's be real, most games these days are easy. This isn't that.

Welcome to BUMBI: a hardcore precision platformer where you try not to die. Traverse six  handcrafted worlds designed to test your skill and patience.

Explore Six Unforgiving Worlds 🌋

Each world introduces taxing trials that will leave you wondering if BUMBI's bone is even worth fetching. From spinning sawblades to slippery slopes, make sure to have your swear jar nearby (you might even be able to go on vacation after finishing this game... if you can).

Precision Platforming in Style 💧

There are no rules here, either be a wimp and play it safe or break some bones trying to achieve the best score in the world. Each level challenges you to showcase your platforming geniusness by offering multiple ways to beat them.

Made with Love 🦴

The developer (me) really wanted to make a game that feels ridiculously fun (and enraging) to play. That's why each and every level is carefully handcrafted. BUMBI's animations have been perfected to accentuate it's ridiculous personality and it's controls have undergone many months of development at the expense of my sanity. And every sound in the game? It's made entirely by mouth! Cause why not.
                                We accept no responsibility for broken keyboards.

Let's be real, most games these days are easy. This isn't that.

Welcome to BUMBI: a hardcore precision platformer where you try not to die. Traverse six  handcrafted worlds designed to test your skill and patience.

Explore Six Unforgiving Worlds 🌋

Each world introduces taxing trials that will leave you wondering if BUMBI's bone is even worth fetching. From spinning sawblades to slippery slopes, make sure to have your swear jar nearby (you might even be able to go on vacation after finishing this game... if you can).

Precision Platforming in Style 💧

There are no rules here, either be a wimp and play it safe or break some bones trying to achieve the best score in the world. Each level challenges you to showcase your platforming geniusness by offering multiple ways to beat them.

Made with Love 🦴

The developer (me) really wanted to make a game that feels ridiculously fun (and enraging) to play. That's why each and every level is carefully handcrafted. BUMBI's animations have been perfected to accentuate it's ridiculous personality and it's controls have undergone many months of development at the expense of my sanity. And every sound in the game? It's made entirely by mouth! Cause why not.
                                We accept no responsibility for broken keyboards.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: If you're running the Steam client, you're good
  • Processor: Any made within the last decade
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any made within the last decade
  • Storage: 78 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Storage: 78 MB available space

name: BUMBI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 78 MB available space

short_description: Expect no handholding in this diehard, handcrafted precision platformer. You play as BUMBI, a dog with a crippling addiction to bones. Make daring jumps, escape fast-moving obstacles, and above all- try not to die (a lot).
